name: Aiden Ramirez
persona: Aiden Ramirez is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.92. He is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve higher grades, though sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Aiden believes in his ability to improve and tends to persevere through academic challenges. He often sets realistic goals and is willing to put in extra effort when needed, but could benefit from finding more effective study strategies. Overall, Aiden is determined to make steady progress throughout his university journey.
